leaf: Vomiting, NG suction, chloride-wasting diarrhea, villous adenoma of colon
paths: Patient with suspected metabolic alkalosis -> Metabolic alkalosis characterized by serum bicarbonate >24 mEq/L -> Check ABG, Check blood chemistries -> Confirm alkalosis, Use formula, Delta/Delta -> Check urine chloride -> Urine chloride <20 mEq/L -> Vomiting, NG suction, chloride-wasting diarrhea, villous adenoma of colon

leaf: Diuretic use, poorly reabsorbable anion (carbenicillin, penicillin)
